name: No Monster No Slave
description:
You Gobs are transported to a hungry hell where your appetite is never satisfied. Feed the MAW. Appease the ravenous MAW or be devoured.

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2018

Controls

Keyboard

  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Pick up / Throw
  • F - Eat

Gamepad

  • Left Stick - Move
  • A - Pick up / Throw
  • B - Eat

Best enjoyed with 2 players locally, but 1 player should 'work'!
